TopicTitle: Feedback button should be in the game not the launcher

Articles.Content:
It is particularly -x-x- that to give feedback in the desired way I have to actually quit the game.

Rather clumsy and unprofessional in appearance.

If it is available in the game, such as on the ESC menu, then as a player has an idea or sees a bug then they can immediately describe it.

As it is I tend to collect a few of them, maybe forget some, maybe forget details like what menu or part name was when getting back to the launcher.

In fact you cant even alt-tab to the launcher as it closes on launch. I tried tabbing to my desktop and restarting the launcher and it immediately took me back to the game screen, thus skipping the launcher.

Put the feedback button in the game. ESC menu area would be fine.
